about:
I'm a dedicated Unity developer with a passion for creating immersive experiences. With one year of experience specializing in the casual and puzzle genres, I excel in problem-solving and collaborating effectively with QA teams and Game Designers. My creativity, technical skills, and drive for excellence enable me to tackle new challenges and contribute to innovative projects.



 As a passionate game developer specializing in Unity, I have a proven track record of integrating various plugins to enhance game functionality and player experience. With strong problem-solving skills and effective collaboration with QA teams and Game Designers, I bring a blend of creativity and technical expertise to every project, always striving for excellence.
